data.text: @katiecouric @tonygoldwyn @kickstarter These stories must be told over and over again. People need to know and understand the toll a wrongful conviction takes on a person. Having 20 or 30 years of your life stolen should never happen!! #freeCyrusWilson
@katiecouric @tonygoldwyn @kickstarter Looks like an Amazing piece.  Can’t wait to watch ...
